Posts.EditableText:
Hi Alex,
you talked about this feature but I cant find it in the issue tracker: the possiblity to upload games that are not shown in the gamelist. I would like to test my game online (performance, etc), but it shouldnt be played by other players or even downloaded for offline-playing.
Posts.HTML:
Hi Alex,
you talked about this feature but I cant find it in the issue tracker: the possiblity to upload games that are not shown in the gamelist. I would like to test my game online (performance, etc), but it shouldnt be played by other players or even downloaded for offline-playing.

Posts.EditableText: It's not on the Issue Tracker as it would be a feature of this website, rather than Quest itself. It's still on my "to do" list - the ability to mark a game as "private" so it won't appear on the public lists. In the meantime, if you email me your .quest file I can upload it manually and then send you the link so you can test it privately. Or, you could run the WebPlayer project from the Quest source.
